name: Indomitable Mount
text: Your skill at riding helps your mount avoid attacks.
prerequisites: Mounted Combat, Handle Animal 5 ranks, Ride 5 ranks, Lastwall affinity.
benefit: Once per round when your mount must make a saving throw, you can make a Ride check as an immediate action. Your mount makes its save if your Ride check result is greater than the DC of the opponentâ€™s attack.
